name: Maskirovda
description:
Unity Engine | 1 Player | 2018

A puzzle game where you try to break up friendships in a little town. By subtly changing news wrong impressions arise and people slowly drift apart.

Developed as a school project at the HKU by:
Jesse van Leeuwen
Max Kersten
Tim Schipper
Peter Trapman
Jasper Oprel
